title: Available 1 Bed 1 Bath
posting_body: Austin, 78723
Mueller Boulevard
1 Bedroom
These apartments feature a living room, dining room, and a kitchen with standard appliances, standard countertops, a dishwasher, and disposal.
There is hardwood flooring in the kitchen, dining room, and living room, tile flooring in the bathroom(s), with carpet in the bedroom(s).
Features central A/C, central heat, ceiling fans, custom lighting, ceiling fans, walk-in closets, high ceilings, handrails, and a private patio/balcony with storage.
Select units have gourmet kitchens, art/media niche with computer desk, polished concrete flooring, private terrace, and outdoor storage.
Full-sized washer/dryer in select units or washer/dryer connections.
Wheelchair accessible.

Community amenities include two refreshing pools with sundeck, courtyard, billiards table, click cafe with Wi-Fi, gourmet kitchen, cinema theater for private movie screenings, conference area, resident lounge, recycling station, shopping center, elevator, onsite package lockers, bike rack storage, night patrol, hammock garden, fitness center, group exercise, and a BBQ/picnic area.
Pets are welcome.
a parking space in the community garage is included with rent.
Located a two-minute drive to Interstate-35.
Short term lease options are available.
PHOTOS ARE AN EXAMPLE OF SIMILAR UNITS WITHIN THE BUILDING, ACTUAL UNIT MAY VARY.
***Availability and pricing is real-time, can change daily, and varies by lease term***
